name: ClientAdminWebAppLoginProxy
title: Login (Password Grant with proxy)
description: Login Users using their email and password, without client_id and client_secret.

examples.title: Success-Response:
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
{
  "token_type": "Bearer",
  "expires_in": 315360000,
  "access_token": "eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbG...",
  "refresh_token": "ZFDPA1S7H8Wydjkjl+xt+hPGWTagX..."
}

name: ClientAdminWebAppRefreshProxy
title: Refresh
description: If refresh_token is not provided the w'll try to get it from the http cookie.

examples.title: Success-Response:
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
{
  "token_type": "Bearer",
  "expires_in": 315360000,
  "access_token": "eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbG...",
  "refresh_token": "ZFDPA1S7H8Wydjkjl+xt+hPGWTagX..."
}

name: LoginCredentialsGrant
title: Login (Client Credentials Grant)
description: Login Users using their username and passwords. (For Third-Party Clients). You must have client ID and secret first. You can generate them by creating new Client in our Web App.
